name: Poetry-By-Love-and-Cheesecake
location: Link Square Mall, Bandra West, Mumbai.
address: Shop 1 And 2, Ground Floor, Kamal Vishrantee Kutir, 24Th Road, Opposite St Theresa School, Pali Hill, Bandra West, Mumbai, Link Square Mall, Mumbai, Mumbai
description: Poetry By Love And Cheesecake is a F&B-Fine Dining restaurant that offers a unique dining experience. The restaurant serves a variety of dishes, from classic comfort food to modern fusion cuisine. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with a warm and inviting ambiance. The menu features a selection of appetizers, entrees, desserts, and drinks. The restaurant also offers a variety of special events, such as wine tastings and live music. The staff is friendly and attentive, and the service is top-notch. Poetry By Love And Cheesecake is the perfect place to enjoy a delicious meal with friends and family.
